info:
Monday - Chest:
• Barbell Bench Press — 4 sets × 8–10 reps
• Incline Dumbbell Press — 3 sets × 10–12 reps
• Cable Fly — 3 sets × 12–15 reps

Tuesday - Back:
• Pull-Ups — 4 sets × 8–10 reps
• Barbell Deadlift — 4 sets × 6–8 reps
• Seated Row — 3 sets × 10–12 reps

Wednesday - Shoulders:
• Overhead Press — 4 sets × 8–10 reps
• Lateral Raise — 3 sets × 12–15 reps
• Rear Delt Fly — 3 sets × 12–15 reps

Thursday - Legs:
• Barbell Squat — 4 sets × 8–10 reps
• Leg Press — 3 sets × 10–12 reps
• Leg Curl — 3 sets × 12–15 reps

Friday - Arms:
• Barbell Bicep Curl — 3 sets × 10–12 reps
• Tricep Dips — 3 sets × 10–12 reps
• Hammer Curl — 3 sets × 12–15 reps

Saturday - Core:
• Plank — 3 sets × 60 sec
• Hanging Leg Raise — 3 sets × 15 reps
• Cable Crunch — 3 sets × 15 reps

Breakfast: Oats with Milk & Banana — 400 kcal, 15g protein
Mid-Morning: Peanut Butter Sandwich — 350 kcal, 12g protein
Lunch: Chicken Breast + Rice + Veggies — 600 kcal, 45g protein
Evening Snack: Protein Shake + Nuts — 300 kcal, 25g protein
Dinner: Paneer/Fish + Rice + Olive Oil — 500 kcal, 40g protein
Before Bed: Greek Yogurt / Milk — 150 kcal, 10g protein
Total: 2300–2500 kcal | 140–160g protein

Breakfast: Egg Whites + Oats — 300 kcal, 25g protein
Mid-Morning: Apple + Green Tea — 150 kcal, 2g protein
Lunch: Grilled Chicken + Quinoa + Veggies — 500 kcal, 40g protein
Evening Snack: Black Coffee + Nuts — 200 kcal, 8g protein
Dinner: Fish / Paneer + Salad — 400 kcal, 35g protein
Before Bed: Low-Fat Yogurt — 100 kcal, 8g protein
Total: 1600–1700 kcal | 110–120g protein
